chunks.en: What is the mentality of people who play short videos out loud on the subway

Every time I take the subway to and from work, especially in the morning, I get a headache when I encounter people playing short videos out loud on the subway. I wish the whole carriage could hear what he (or she) is watching (mostly movie commentaries or news reviews). If it's playing out loud next to me, I can only stand up and move away. Nowadays, even headphones that cost a few dozen yuan are good enough
If the sound is loud, tell them directly to lower the volume. Don't be a yes-man on the spot, but be tough online

The biggest problem with the average quality of our citizens is that they never consider the impact they have on others, regardless of whether they are domestic or foreign, and their various behaviors are extremely outrageous
You can block the sound with headphones, but smokers on the road are really annoying
What's the use of complaining here? When I encounter someone playing it on the subway, I just shout loudly, and if they don't stop, I'll swear, and at worst, I'll fight.

It's not polite but it doesn't really affect me. I don't understand why people would play it so loudly. I mute everything I watch because I feel like people hearing what I'm watching is like exposing my privacy
If you have an iPhone, you can buy a pop-up blocker to deal with it, but there's no way for Android
You can tolerate the subway for at most two stops, but what about the high-speed rail? Adults and children playing TV shows out loud, playing games, scrolling through Douyin...
I rarely encounter people playing videos loudly on the Hangzhou subway because there are often inspectors walking around. When they see someone playing it out loud, they go over to dissuade them

@Hiok #6 I'll go up and say directly, please don't play it out loud (in a very strong tone). I weigh over 200 pounds, and most people will turn off the sound when they see my physique. If I meet a middle-aged man who is reluctant to turn it off, I'll give him a direct look, the kind of look that says, if you don't turn off the sound today, I'll make you leave your phone and yourself here today. Basically, it can be solved at this point. If it still can't be solved after this, I think I can only start swearing. Anyway, I can't be the first to start a fight. I'm not afraid to fight.
Cyber exhibitionism

I've seen one, and I've educated one. I have three videos recorded now. I plan to see how much material of this kind I can collect by the end of the year and make a big mix-cut of uncivilized behavior.
Besides anger, there's nothing else I can do, damn ByteDance.
